actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Employees' Compensation Acts, title 5, United States Code, by adding a new section providing for work injury coverage of Federal petit and grand jurors in the performance of their duties.

summary.text: Extends coverage of the Federal Employees' Compensation Act to any person serving on a Federal petit or grand jury. Defines: (1) the rate of pay of a juror who is not a Government employee for purposes of determining disability and death benefits under such Act; and (2) the circumstances under which a juror is considered to be performing jury service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Employees' Compensation Acts, title 5, United States Code, by adding a new section providing for work injury coverage of Federal petit and grand jurors in the performance of their duties.
